mapper.insert: INSERT INTO code(cate_num, code, code_name, ord, chk_use, comt, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{cate_num}, #{code}, #{code_name}, #{ord}, #{chk_use}, #{comt}, now(), #{reg_id}, now(), #{up_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE code set cate_num = #{cate_num}, code = #{code}, code_name = #{code_name}, ord = #{ord}, chk_use = #{chk_use}, comt = #{comt} where code_id = #{code_id};
